title: Tokyo: The Critical Point
description:
Description :
        "As for the tutoring fee, you can pay me with s**."That is how the relationship between Jinguuji Yuito and Saotome Kyouhei started.For the first time in his life, Jinguuji Yuito, who grew up in an abusive household, finally got attached to something that he longed forSaotome Kyouhei.In the spring when they started high school, he was the one who taught him the scent of cleanliness.Although he didn't manage to get close to him during their high school years, he found his chance when Kyouhei failed his university admission exam and offered to tutor him in exchange for s**.For someone like him, who came from a prestigious family where appearances take priority, and who has lived his life numbing his feelings, the time spent with Yuito was when he learned about a part of himself that he had been avoiding.However, their relationship would only last until Kyouhei got accepted into university. After that, they would go back to being strangers... or not?!The miraculous love story reaches completion!+
